name: PawChamp
tagline: Dog Training and Care App: AI Companion and 24/7 Dog Experts
description: üêæ PawChamp - Dog Training and Care Companion. Meet Pawchie AI üê∂ your virtual training buddy (Claude-powered) + 24/7 real dog experts chats + pawsome expert-verified, science-based, bite-sized learning for you and your pup. ‚ù§Ô∏è Become a better pet parent!

name: CalPulse
tagline: Snap the Menu. Get Instant Calories & Macros
description: Snap any menu and instantly get calories, macros & healthier swaps. Make informed choices while deciding, not regretting. Perfect for dining out, travel, and food delivery.

name: Chirpz
tagline: Uncover unknown citations with AI
description: Chirpz finds, reads, and ranks academic papers for you ‚Äî instantly. It searches across research databases and brings back the best matches with citations and metadata, right where you write.

name: Dictly
tagline: Private, on-device dictation ‚Äî fast, styled and 100% offline
description: Dictly v1.2 introduces faster, smarter on-device dictation with new Quick Capture context, metadata chips, and visual refinements. Stay private, work faster, and enjoy a smoother, more customizable workflow ‚Äî still 100 % offline and entirely on your device.

name: Neatify
tagline: Make your Mac organized, effortlessly
description: Neatify organizes your Mac files automatically. Create project structures in seconds, set sorting rules by extension, and stay organized 24/7 from your menu bar. Native Swift app for students, freelancers, and anyone tired of Downloads chaos.

name: Kodus
tagline: Open-source AI Code Review that won‚Äôt let you break prod
description: Kody is an open-source agent with deep knowledge of your architecture, business rules, and compliance standards. It aligns with your org policies, adapts to your stack, enforces team rules, and runs on any model you choose.

name: Draft'n Run
tagline: No-code studio for custom AI building and running
description: Draft'n run empowers teams to design, deploy, and monitor AI-powered features faster than ever. Transform complex AI integration into an intuitive, visual process with full transparency, control, and scalability.

name: SuperIntern v0.3
tagline: Always-On Meeting AI: Live Notes, Instant Answers
description: An always-on, in-meeting AI that writes structured notes live, answers mid-discussion questions (facts, docs, past decisions), and ships a share-ready summary without a bot joining. Request early access for Mac; early users get 60 minutes free at launch.

name: Sort Feed
tagline: Sort, analyze, and download Instagram content instantly
description: Sort Feed helps creators and marketers grow smarter on Instagram. Instantly analyze, sort, and bulk download posts & reels ‚Äî complete with metrics, captions, and hashtags. All analytics are processed locally for privacy.

name: Foundation: Galactic Frontier
tagline: Adventure into Issac Asimov's epic sci-fi universe
description: Foundation: Galactic Frontier (FGF) is a sci-fi strategy game based on Issac Asimov's Foundation series, officially licensed by Apple TV and Skydance. In FGF, player play as a trader and navigate through a universe where the Galactic Empire slowly crumbles.

name: Cooky
tagline: Organize your recipes, understand your food
description: Your Recipes. Organized. Healthy. Stop losing recipes in bookmarks. Organize all your recipes in one place and track nutrition automatically. Know exactly what's in your food.

name: Vancit
tagline: Find and evaluate developers fast‚Äîhire smarter.
description: The first active sourcing tool tailored for developer sourcing. Speed up your hiring process by filtering candidates and analyze their abilities that go beyond a simple resume.

name: Formia
tagline: 2d to 3d logo maker
description: Stand out with a 3D logo.

name: ShipJournal
tagline: Daily build log for indie makers
description: Write one short update per day. Keep your streak alive. ShipJournal helps indie makers stay consistent with their build-in-public journey through a simple daily journaling habit. No AI, no distractions just your progress, one log at a time.

name: Whop Video Downloader
tagline: Download videos from your Whop courses to your computer
description: Whop Video Downloader is a simple, open-source tool designed to make it effortless to download videos from Whop.

name: Mention.ma
tagline: Improve your brand visibility in ChatGPT and AI answers.
description: Mention.ma is an GEO platform that helps companies measure and improve their visibility in ChatGPT, Perplexity and AI answers. The platform tracks brand mentions and provides actionable recommendations to increase your visibility across AI search engines.

name: ShadcnThemer.com
tagline: Design & share beautiful themes for shadcn/ui
description: Discover and create beautiful themes for shadcn/ui. Browse thousands of community-made themes, customize colors, select Google Fonts, adjust border radius, and export themes instantly for your shadcn projects.

name: Rock8.ai
tagline: Skyrocket your voice calling Campaigns with AI
description: Rock8.ai is an AI-powered voice agent that makes human-like outbound calls to generate leads, qualify prospects & collect feedback ‚Äî automatically. Launch campaigns in minutes with no-code workflows. Ideal for Real Estate, EdTech, Healthcare & BFSI teams.

name: THE NAME COMPANY
tagline: Generate creative .COM names for your next idea
description: The Name Company helps you generate creativeCOM names for your next startup, product, or idea.

name: Cloudtellix
tagline: AWS cost cuts as Jira tickets devs actually fix
description: CloudTellix turns AWS cost waste into Jira tickets devs actually fix. We scan daily for idle resources, analyze metrics, and create tickets with proof, verification commands, and fix steps. Average result: 30-40% cost reduction. Free beta.
